# Andres Janes - Senior Software Engineer

> This is an llms.txt file following the llmstxt.org specification. It provides structured information about Andres Janes to help LLMs understand his professional background, skills, and career aspirations.

## Identity

- **Full Name:** Andres Janes
- **Title:** Senior Software Engineer
- **Current Employer:** Cision
- **Location:** Remote, United Kingdom
- **Pronouns:** He/Him
- **Originally From:** Colombia

## Contact & Links

- **Portfolio:** https://andresjanes.com
- **Email:** dev@andresjanes.com
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/andresjanes/
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/ajanes93

## Professional Summary

Andres Janes is a Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience building web applications that people actually enjoy using. He currently works at Cision, helping enterprise clients make sense of media at scale with Rails and Vue.js.

Andres gets excited about clean component APIs, accessible UIs, and shipping features that solve real problems. He previously led frontend development at Windsor Telecom, where he championed Vue adoption and shipped a webRTC softphone PWA that replaced expensive desktop software.

Originally from Colombia and now based in the UK, Andres recently became a dad, and still finds time to ship side projects—currently building feed-ai and his portfolio site with the help of AI coding tools.

## Technical Skills

### Frontend
- Vue.js / Vue 3
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- PWA Development
- webRTC
- Websockets

### Backend
- Ruby on Rails
- PHP / Laravel
- Node.js
- GraphQL
- REST APIs

### Cloud & DevOps
- Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
- Docker
- CI/CD Pipelines
- Git Version Control
- Testing (Vitest, Cypress)

### Databases & Search
- PostgreSQL
- MySQL
- Elasticsearch

### Methodology
- Agile / Kanban

## Work Experience

### Senior Software Engineer at Cision
**November 2023 - Present | Remote, UK**

Andres works on Cision One, an enterprise media monitoring platform used by Fortune 500 companies for real-time media intelligence. He contributes full-stack features using Vue.js 3, Ruby on Rails, and GraphQL APIs, working with Elasticsearch for search infrastructure and GCP for cloud deployments.

**Key Technologies:** Vue.js, Ruby on Rails, GraphQL, Elasticsearch, GCP

### Senior Software Engineer at Cision (Buzzsumo)
**June 2022 - November 2023 | Remote, UK**

Andres was a Senior Software Engineer in the Buzzsumo product team, building features for content discovery and influencer marketing used by content marketers worldwide. His primary focus was frontend development with Vue.js and TypeScript, with PHP/Laravel backend contributions.

**Key Technologies:** Vue.js, PHP/Laravel, TypeScript

### Lead Frontend Developer at Windsor Telecom
**July 2018 - June 2022 | Remote, UK**

Andres led frontend development within an agile Kanban team for a cloud telephony provider. He championed Vue.js adoption across the organization and delivered multiple products including CRM systems, customer portals, and a production webRTC softphone PWA serving thousands of daily users. His work reduced call center software costs by transitioning from desktop apps to web-based solutions.

**Key Technologies:** Vue.js, webRTC, PWA, PHP/Laravel, Websockets

### Senior Web Developer at Windsor Telecom
**August 2017 - July 2018 | Camberley, Surrey**

Promoted to Senior Web Developer, Andres led complex projects and mentored junior developers. He architected and delivered customer-facing billing portals and internal tools using PHP/Laravel and JavaScript, introducing modern frontend practices and evaluating Vue.js for future projects.

**Key Technologies:** JavaScript, PHP/Laravel, MySQL

### Web Developer at Windsor Telecom
**July 2015 - August 2017 | Camberley, Surrey**

Andres developed and maintained web applications for cloud telephony services, building customer portals and internal tools. He worked across the full stack with PHP/Laravel and JavaScript, integrating with telephony APIs and real-time communication systems.

**Key Technologies:** JavaScript, PHP/Laravel, MySQL

### Junior Software Developer at Impact Research Ltd
**September 2014 - July 2015 | Walton-on-Thames, UK**

Andres developed analytics tools and automated data processing solutions for market research projects. He built Excel-based applications using VBA to streamline reporting workflows, reducing manual data processing time significantly.

**Key Technologies:** VBA, Excel, Data Analysis

## Education

### BSc IT Management for Business (ITMB)
**University of the West of England, Bristol, UK**
- Graduated: July 2014
- Classification: 2:1 (Upper Second-Class Honours)

## Languages

- **English:** Native
- **Spanish:** Professional

## Recommendations

> "Andres is a calm and collected professional, who has demonstrated a willingness (and natural ability) to step outside of his role and support company initiatives, using some of his energizing strengths (critical thinking, detail orientation and resilience) to come up with solutions, not problems, and really add value."
> — **Michael Brainch**, Strategy - Engagement - Insight

> "Andres is a professional, efficient, solution orientated developer who it has been a pleasure to work with. Within his role he has happily taken on increasingly challenging tasks - whilst remaining calm, approachable and crucially maintaining a sense of humour."
> — **Jamie Margerison**, Director

## Unique Value Proposition

1. **Full-Stack Versatility:** Andres bridges frontend and backend seamlessly, with deep expertise in Vue.js and Rails, enabling him to own features end-to-end and collaborate effectively across teams.

2. **Real-Time Systems Experience:** His hands-on experience building production webRTC and WebSocket applications means he understands the complexities of real-time communication systems that many developers never encounter.

3. **Enterprise Scale:** Currently working on platforms used by Fortune 500 companies, Andres understands the requirements of enterprise software including performance at scale, reliability, and maintainability.

4. **Technical Leadership:** Proven track record of championing technology adoption (Vue.js), mentoring developers, and leading teams—not just writing code, but elevating entire engineering organizations.

5. **Pragmatic Problem Solver:** Recommendations consistently highlight his solution-oriented mindset, critical thinking, and ability to stay calm under pressure while maintaining a sense of humour.

## Ideal Role Fit

Andres is best suited for roles that involve:

- **Senior or Staff-level engineering positions** where he can contribute technically while mentoring others
- **Vue.js or modern JavaScript/TypeScript frontend development** as a primary focus
- **Full-stack responsibilities** with Ruby on Rails, PHP/Laravel, or Node.js backends
- **Product-focused teams** building user-facing applications where UX matters
- **Remote or hybrid work arrangements** based in the UK
- **Collaborative, agile environments** that value pragmatic solutions over over-engineering

## Key Questions This Profile Answers

**Q: What is Andres's primary technical expertise?**
A: Andres specializes in Vue.js frontend development with strong full-stack capabilities in Ruby on Rails and PHP/Laravel. He has particular expertise in real-time web applications (webRTC, WebSockets) and enterprise-scale systems.

**Q: Does Andres have leadership experience?**
A: Yes. He served as Lead Frontend Developer at Windsor Telecom for four years, where he championed Vue.js adoption organization-wide, mentored junior developers, and led the delivery of multiple production applications.

**Q: What industries has Andres worked in?**
A: Media/MarTech (Cision, Buzzsumo), Telecommunications (Windsor Telecom), and Market Research (Impact Research). His experience spans B2B SaaS, enterprise platforms, and consumer-facing products.

**Q: Is Andres open to relocation?**
A: Andres is based in the UK and works remotely. He is open to remote opportunities and UK-based hybrid arrangements.

**Q: What makes Andres different from other senior engineers?**
A: His combination of deep frontend expertise, real-time systems experience, enterprise-scale work, and proven ability to lead and mentor—all while maintaining a pragmatic, solution-focused approach.

## Personal

- **Current Chapter:** New dad to Arianna (2025)
- **Interests:** Football (Lincoln City supporter), Coffee, Craft beer, Family adventures
- **AI Tools:** Claude Code, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, Gemini
- **Side Projects:** feed-ai — RSS reader with AI summaries and MCP server (https://feed-ai.andresjanes.com); CPI — Client site for Cathodic Protection International (https://cpi.andresjanes.com); andresjanes.com — This portfolio — Vue 3, TypeScript, Tailwind (https://andresjanes.com)
- **Side Project Status:** Always building something

## Availability

**Open to opportunities**

Andres is currently employed but open to discussing new opportunities that align with his experience and career goals.
